CatDescriptText: Maxine Sidberry, 1110 Cresswell Street, Democrat, 16th Ward, and Joan Ray, 1110 Cresswell Street, Democrat, 16th Ward, were part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 14, 1957, pg. 3 with question: "Who is your Ward Chairman? Does he have any power? Does he exert his power?" Mrs. Sidberry's answer reads: "I've been told that my ward chairman is Nick Stone, whom I don't personally I'm told that he has power, and uses that power when he has to."  Mrs. Ray's answer reads: I don't know who the ward chairman is; don't know of any power that he has; and, personally, don't know of anything that he has done."
TitMainTitle: Maxine Sidberry and Joan Ray standing with two children on street in St. Clair Village
